title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.2.20.2 Beta 发布
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2018-4-21 16:21 编辑 



测试版是Minecraft 基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
 然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的领域服务器不兼容，不提供支持。如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
 Minecraft 基岩版 1.4 正式版 仍未发布， 1.2.20.2  为其第N个测试版
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
   
更新日志：

实验性游戏内容：
改动：Updated Dolphin model升级了海豚的模型Dolphins now have sounds海豚现在有音效了Added Pocket UI screens for Compound Creator, Element Constructor, MaterialReducer, and Lab Table为几个化学工具添加了携带版UI界面Updated textures for Nautilus Shell and Heart of the Sea更新了鹦鹉螺壳和海洋之心的材质


BUG修复：Fixed a crash that occurred when creating a world when the Education Edition toggle was enabled修复了在创建世界时打开教育版开关发生的崩溃Fixed a crash that occurred when deleting a World or Resource Pack through the Storage screen修复了在存储界面删除存档或资源包时发生的崩溃Attempting to import Education Edition world files no longer resets worlds试图导入教育版存档时不再重置存档了Reduced the delay when placing or destroying blocks减少了放置或摧毁方块时的延迟Curse of Binding and Vanishing books can no longer be acquired by trading with a Librarian Villager与图书管理员村民交易不再能获得绑定和消失附魔的附魔书All Chemistry items now appear in Creative inventory if Education Edition cheat is enabled如果教育版特性已经开启，所有的化学物品现在都将显示在创造模式物品栏中Reduced the amount of Magma Blocks that generate in underwater ravines减少了在水下峡谷中生成的岩浆块的数量Bucket of Fish items now appear in the Creative Inventory现在，创造模式物品栏中会出现一批鱼类的物品Dolphins can successfully get back to water now海豚现在可以成功回到水中了Fixed several of the top crashed that occurred during gameplay修复了在游戏过程中发生的几次崩溃Fixed some toggles and buttons staying highlighted in Settings when they shouldn't修复了某些开关和按钮在设置中保持高亮显示状态的情况Fixed the crafting recipes of Prismarine Bricks and Dark Prismarine being switched修复了海晶石台阶和暗海晶石台阶的制作配方Guardians will now attack Cod守卫者现在会攻击鳕鱼Guardians can no longer jump out of the water and suspend themselves in air while firing their beam守卫者不能跳出水面，并在发射激光时悬挂在空中了Water can once again be removed with a bucket if there is a block above it如果水上方有一个方块可以再次用桶去除The Paper Doll is no longer running on the main menu纸娃娃l不再在主菜单上显示了It is once again possible to fill an Empty Bucket using touch controls可以再次使用触屏来填充空桶Water around chests in Ruins no longer appears if the Ruin generates above water如果废墟在水面上生成，废墟中不会再出现箱子了Charging a Bow or Trident and switching items no longer causes blocks to not drop when broken拉起的弓箭和三叉戟切换时不再导致方块掉落并损坏了Ravines once again generate correctly洞穴再次正确生成Crouching and flying up no longer causes the player to jump in Creative mode潜行并飞起不会再导致玩家进入创造模式了


https://feedback.minecraft.net/k ... -one-windows-10-and


相关地址谷歌正版https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe基岩版测试组安卓Google Play：https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Store：https://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/xbox-insider-hub/9nblggh68vsk基岩版官方博客https://feedback.minecraft.net/ 
 


外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪 Minecraft官网（英文）Minecraft基岩版官方博客 （英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，需魔法上网）Jason的Twitter（英文，需魔法上网）Matt Booty的Twitter（英文，需魔法上网）tomcc的Twitter（英文，需魔法上网）/MattGartzke的Twitter（英文，需魔法上网）HelenAngel的Twitter（英文，需魔法上网）Chupacaubrey的Twitter（英文，需魔法上网）
